item.title: How I passed the OSCP
item.description:
My Journey to Passing the OSCP

Passing the OffSec Certified Professional (OSCP) certification was more than just an achievement for me â€” it was the realization of a dream I had nurtured since 2021. Looking back, the journey was full of challenges, late nights, and a lot of learning, but every step was worth it.

The Preparation Phase

The thought of achieving this certification stayed in my mind for years, but the timing was never right.
